title: Why did the Repair tool break my client?
body: I re install the game to reduce your bugs. Then I bugsplat for the first time ever. Like my bad for using your " repair tool ". All it did was fuck me over why is this even an option for your users? I give you hundreds of dollars and you lure me into a fake repair tool that ruins my experience. Shameful.

replies.body:
* The repair tool typically works fine.

* If your game worked without corruption/crashes, why did you use it?

* There is no relation between your purchases and file corruption, and this has zero effect on your account..

* All you need to do is run it properly, also make sure AV is disabled and your drive is not damaged/corrupt

I am thinking this is a troll post..

I clearly stated I wanted it to reduce bugs. Every game I would have to change my in game graphics. Every single game. After resetting everything game is running fine. But still bugsplatted going into a game then had to sit for 20 minutes while it repaired itself. Was a butthurt post not troll
